description: Alphabetical sort by narrative title, with a secondary sort on the queue time.
Alphabetical sort by the app's module name and title
Numeric sort by the apps submission (queue) time, and in the unlikely event that two jobs were started at precisely the same time, the run time is used secondarily
A special sort which orders by job status codes in the following order: queued, running, finished, errored_queued, errored_running, canceled_queued, canceled_running
